architectural_notes: Remove/disable automated success/info toast messages (e.g., "mission created successfully") while keeping all other functionality unchanged.

existing_features.title: Disable all automated in-app toast/notification popups (e.g., “Mission created successfully”) so that no Sonner toast messages are shown anywhere in the app, while keeping all underlying app logic and flows unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Disable automated in-app messages/notifications (e.g., "mission created successfully") without changing any other app functionality

projectName: Disable automated in-app toast messages (e.g., “Mission created successfully”) without changing app functionality
